content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in frosinone on july 14 2017 the case involved multiple parties referred to by initials the court made several decisions including declaring an open ab intestate succession for a person referred to as mm the court also determined the legitimate heirs entitled to a share of the estate additionally the court declared the nullity of a donation made by one of the parties and ordered the return of the donated property to the coheirs the court formed an estate to be divided and rejected claims for the restitution of fruits the court cited various articles of the civil code in its decision the case involved multiple proceedings and the court ordered further actions to be taken including the determination of the value of property contributed by one of the parties and the reformulation of a divisional plan the court also remitted the costs of the case overall the court made a final ruling on the dispute regarding an inheritance dismissing the claims and exceptions made by the parties the deceased persons estate will be distributed among three legitimate heirs and a donation was declared null with the property being returned to the heirs the court ordered the division of assets according to a divisional project prepared by an expert rejected objections made by the parties and compensated the parties for their costs the decision was made on july 14 2017 and filed with the court registry on the same day
